alert.note: Alert for Coconino; Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 27 at 3:22PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of east central and north central Arizona near Pine. * WHEN...Until 500 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in creeks and normally dry washes is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 319 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms has ended. Minor flooding is ongoing. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... West Webber Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pine and Geronimo Boy Scout Camp. - This includes State Route 87 between mile markers 266 and 269. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
